newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Foreigners net sellers of Dutch securities in Q2.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners net sellers of Dutch securities in Q2.

text.p: Foreigners were net sellers of Dutch shares and Dutch government bonds in the second quarter of 1996 after being net buyers of both in the first quarter, figures published by the Dutch Central Bank show.
The figures, published in the bank's report for the second quarter of the year, showed that foreigners were net buyers of Dutch non-government bonds in both quarters.
NET FOREIGN PURCHASES OF DUTCH SECURITIES
NET DUTCH PURCHASES OF FOREIGN SECURITIES
NOTES - All figures in billions of guilders. Minus sign denotes net sales. -- Amsterdam newsroom +31 20 504 5000
